header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 108, page 79, line 9, at end insert—
“( ) A person commits an offence under the law of England and Wales if he or she—
text.IndentOne: (a) is the parent or guardian of a child, and
(b) gives consent for that child to marry before the age of 18.”

text.quote: 000: Clause 109, page 80, line 3, at end insert—
“( ) A person commits an offence under the law of Scotland if he or she—
text.IndentOne: (a) is the parent or guardian of a child, and
(b) gives consent for that child to marry before the age of 18.”

text.quote: 000: After Clause 109, insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentOne: The Secretary of State shall report to Parliament annually on the effectiveness of the criminalisation of forced marriage under Part 9 of this Act.”
